questions.question: This arc takes the Straw Hat Pirates to a sky island where they face off against a self-proclaimed God with lightning powers. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against the undead on a ghost island under the control of Gecko Moria. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This technique allows its user to multiply their limbs and heads, as seen used by a certain Marine officer. What is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Hawk Eyes', is a master swordsman and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Who is...?
